stanza.line: Were't aught to me I bore the (a)canopy(/a)
Which proves more short than waste or (b)ruining(/b)
Have I not seen dwellers on form and (c)favour(/c)
Lose all and more by paying too much (d)rent(/d)
No let me be obsequious in thy (e)heart(/e)
And take thou my oblation poor but (f)free(/f)
Which is not mixed with seconds knows no (e)art(/e)
But mutual render only me for (f)thee(/f)
Hence thou suborned informer a true (g)soul(/g)
When most impeached stands least in thy (g)control(/g)
